name: Identity
tagline: HTML5UP Identity Template For Pico CMS
body:
# Identity HTML5UP Identity Template For Pico CMS Download the identity folder, upload it in the themes folder of your pico installation and change the following setting within your config.php: $config['theme'] = 'identity'; For The content download our index.md, upload it in the content folder and make your change. For Social Icon we use Font Awesome. For Your Image you can download your profile picture in images folder in theme folder with the same name : "avatar.jpg" or you can use the meta Image in the index.md : Image: http://yoursite.com/yourpicture.jpg For The Background change the "bg.jpg" in the folder images with your background image.
Recommanded Size :
avatar.jpg => 122x122 px | bg.jpg 1440x900 px ####Demo : http://html5up.net/uploads/demos/identity/ ##Screenshot
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
